result.eng: It was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.html: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ tú idir ḋá ċoṁairle maidir leis an ḟreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.

result.html: Maidir le do litirRegarding your letter...
result.ponchtml: Maidir le do litirRegarding your letter...

result.eng: As for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ga: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.orig: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.html: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat achAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ponchtml: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat aċAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...

result.eng: I need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ga: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.orig: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.html: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradhI need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ponchtml: Teastaíonn uaim laḃairt leat maidir le mo ċonraḋI need to talk to you about my contract.
